title: Indian HC condemns reports of troops in SL
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Indian High Commission has strongly denied false reports claiming that India is dispatching its soldiers to Sri Lanka.
The High Commission has also condemned such irresponsible reporting and expects the concerned to desist from spreading rumours.
